content:
Here's a shopping list for the Seafood Paella recipe:

**Pantry:**

* Bomba or Calasparra rice (1 cup)
* Olive oil (2 tablespoons)
* Onion (1)
* Garlic (2 cloves)
* Canned diced tomatoes (1 cup)
* Smoked paprika (1 teaspoon)
* Saffron threads (1 teaspoon)
* Salt (1 teaspoon)
* Black pepper (1/2 teaspoon)
* Chicken broth (2 cups)
* Water (1 cup)
* White wine (1/4 cup) (optional)

**Proteins:**

* Large shrimp (1 pound)
* Mussels (1 pound)
* Clams (1 pound)
* Chorizo (1/2 pound)
* Spanish sausage or chicken (1/2 pound) (optional)

**Produce:**

* Fresh parsley or cilantro (for garnish)
* Lemon (1)

**Miscellaneous:**

* Paella pan or large skillet
* Cutting board
* Knife
* Measuring cups and spoons
* Spatula
* Tongs or slotted spoon

**Optional ingredients:**

* Red pepper flakes (for added heat)
* Bell peppers (for added color)
* Artichoke hearts (for added flavor)
* Cherry tomatoes (for added color)

**Substitutions:**

* You can substitute chicken or vegetable broth for the seafood broth if you prefer.
* You can use other types of rice, such as Arborio or Japanese rice, but Bomba or Calasparra are traditional.
* You can use other types of seafood, such as scallops or squid, but adjust the cooking time accordingly.

Remember to check your pantry and fridge before you head out to shop, as you may already have some of the ingredients on hand!
